paper_abstract: In this paper we present a coding scheme for plane triangulations. The coding scheme is very simple, and needs only 6n bits for each plane triangulation with n vertices. Also with additional o(n) bits it supports adjacency, degree and clockwise neighbour queries in constant time. Our scheme is based on a realizer of a plane triangulation. The best known algorithm needs only 4.35n + o(n) bits for each plane triangulation. Our algorithm is simple and needs 6n + o(n) bits for each plane triangulation. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A compact encoding of plane triangulations with efficient query supports
